author: swagata87
body:
#### PR description:

This is a continuation of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40327. As mentioned there, in this PR the variables iEta, iPhi, iX and iY are added directly to the Supercluster object, so that they can be accessed from AOD/miniAOD-based analysis setups in a more convenient, easy and user-friendly way. 

#### PR validation:

Checked with workflow `2500.601`

FYI @Sam-Harper
title: Add iEta/iX, iPhi/iY to supercluster object
